name: Grading type
answer: I - Pitting edemaoedema may present; completely resolve on elevation (during overnight) and normal skin,II(early) - Pitting edemaoedema manifests; does not resolve completely  on elevation (overnight). Normal skin,II(late) - Late stages of II with non-pitting oedema & thickened skin,III - Oedema is not pitting with tropic skin changes; Acanthosis/Fat deposits/Warty over growth
